medical_history.chief_complaint: Total body itching and rash progressing to peeling skin.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began shortly after leaving the ED; initially presented with fever, cough, and chest/back pain. Developed total body itching and rash after a visit to the ED for supportive care. The rash progressed to peeling skin on her back and arms. Took Benadryl at home with no relief but felt better after receiving Solumedrol, Benadryl, and Pepcid.
medical_history.past_medical_history: s/p aortic root, ascending aorta, and hemiarch replacement; s/p tubal ligation.
medical_history.family_history: Mother has breast cancer; denies family history of SLE or other rheumatologic disease.
